Sentencas: Control strategies of distributed generation (DG) are investigated for different combination of DG and storage units in a microgrid.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: In this paper the authors proposed a microgrid structure which consists of a detailed photovoltaic (PV) array model, a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and various loads.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: Real and reactive power (PQ) control and droop control are developed for microgrid operation.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: In grid-connected mode, PQ control is developed by controlling the active and reactive power output of DGs in accordance with assigned references.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: Two PI controllers were used in the PQ controller, and a novel heuristic method, artificial bee colony (ABC), was adopted to tune the PI parameters.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: DGs can be controlled by droop control both under grid-connected and islanded modes.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: Droop control implements power reallocation between DGs, based on predefined droop characteristics whenever load changes or the microgrid is connected/disconnected to the grid, while the microgrid voltage and frequency is maintained at appropriate levels.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: Through voltage, frequency, and power characteristics in the simulation under different scenarios, the proposed control strategies have demonstrated to work properly and effectively.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation

Sentencas: The simulation results also show the effectiveness of tuning PI parameters by the ABC.
Titulo: Distributed generation system control strategies with PV and fuel cell in microgrid operation
